job.title: Data Scientist / Data Analyst
job.description: Description:   Data&nbsp;Scientist&nbsp;/&nbsp;Data&nbsp;Analyst Requirements   Location: Anywhere in US but wiling to work Pacific hours.&nbsp;   ·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3+ years of&nbsp;data&nbsp;science,&nbsp;data&nbsp;analytics, or business intelligence experience·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Strong understanding of SQL&nbsp;&nbsp;( Strong - Strong)·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience with conducting&nbsp;data&nbsp;analysis in&nbsp;Python and / or R·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience building clear and easy to understand dashboards and presentations&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(Tableau - Strong )·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Ability to communicate clearly and effectively to cross functional partners of varying technical levels·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Ability to define relevant metrics that can guide and influence stakeholders to appropriate and accurate insightsPluses·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Familiarity with Superset·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Familiarity with running weblab experiments, efficacy studies, or product validation tests·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Familiarity with machine learning basics·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Familiarity with Airbnb infrastructure, including Airflow, Presto SQL, and Hive SQL·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience creating and maintaining&nbsp;data&nbsp;pipelines·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience supporting engineering product work
